entry.title: Bitcoin Core 0.9rc1 release schedule
entry.summary: In January 2014, Wladimir responded to a message from Odinn Cyberguerrilla on GitHub regarding issues with the blockchain and microdonations. Wladimir requested that Odinn provide pull requests to address these issues, stating that if Odinn's organization had not contributed anything towards improving the issues, it should not come as a surprise that they did not make it into the Bitcoin codebase. The link provided leads to the specific pull request for this conversation.
